mapper.select: SELECT t.task_id, t.title, t.description, t.reward, t.status AS task_status, poster.username AS poster_username, receiver.username AS receiver_username, o.order_status, o.payment_status FROM tasks t LEFT JOIN orders o ON o.task_id = t.task_id LEFT JOIN users poster ON o.poster_id = poster.user_id LEFT JOIN users receiver ON o.receiver_id = receiver.user_id
